reviews.review:
A classic. Still looks and plays good. I never realised how good the lighting is. Sometimes I had to do a double take down a sewer hallway or something because the way the light hit the ground and walls... looked real.

Ageing very well!

9.5/10

I cannpt put into words how good this games is so I'll just leave it at play this game
good game i finished chapter entanglement dont know what to say eccept, you combine stop hitting my turrets!

i've always wanted to play a half life game ever since i have initially heard of the game but never got the chance to play it
when i got the chance to do so i bought the orange box pack as i also wanted to try out portal.
after purchase, i launched half life 2 and was greeted with a speech from Gman, this single introduction to the game told me that i was going to have an experience like no other, after exiting the train made my way through the train station met barney and threw a can at a metrocop, i arrived in City 17 and an amazing view of the citadel.

the first chapter just made me feel like i was really there the dystopian feel of the city, the old and dirty apartments, everything in this game from start to finish was pure joy, nova prospekt was pure immersive combat and combined with you, the player teaming up with the antlions created (in my opinion) an extremely fun experience over all
all the chapters never felt repetitive as each one had its own playstyle and mechanic introduced to it.

Over all i absolutely loved this game from start to finish every second was enjoyable and every single time was holding the W key or clicked to shot it felt amazing and all that for only 9.99$ 
money well spent buy the game you wont regret it.

even after a decade, Half-Life 2 remains probably one of the best FPS games, not to mention that it helped shape and pave the way for modern FPS games.

if you haven't played it, there's no time like the present

The scenery looks amazing-- I don't really like the pacing of it however-- bit too slow. It is also not really obvious where the go a lot of the times. Ravenholm feels kinda pushed in there-- as if it was from a beta or something (Cough Cough). Backhopping can be fun but I cant say it's a great game-- "Half Life: Alyx" is much better in my opinion.
